pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ex-Aid (2016, TV show)$(br2)Health: 300$(br2)Special moves:$(li)Can use Pause to freeze the player$(li)Transforms into $(l:ex_aid/riders/cronus#gamedeus)Gamedeus Cronus$(/l) at under 100 health$(li)As Gamedeus Cronus, can use Reset to force the player back to their base form (unless they have the Save effect)$(br2)Drops$(li)2-4 $(l:ex_aid/items/blank_gashat)Blank Gashats$(/l)$(li)1-2 $(l:ex_aid/items/rider_gashats#mighty_brothers_xx_unfinished_gashat)Unfinished XX Gashats$(/l)$(li)1 $(l:ex_aid/items/rider_gashats#kamen_rider_chronicle_gashat)Kamen Rider Chronicle Gashat$(/l)$(li)1 $(l:ex_aid/items/blank_gashat)Blank Gashat$(/l) (80%)$(li)1 $(l:ex_aid/items/rider_gashats#kamen_rider_chronicle_gashat_gamedeus)Kamen Rider Chronicle Gashat (Gamedeus)$(/l) (20%)
